data.title: Gladys Marcus Library
data.meta_description: The vast array of materials in FIT's Gladys Marcus Library collections—plus resources available through interlibrary loan will allow you to dig deep into what you’re studying. We support academic and research needs of the FIT community in art and design, business, technology, and liberal arts. Our collections include specialized print, electronic and digital resources, books, periodicals, databases, and Special Collections and College Archives.
data.text: The vast array of materials at the Gladys Marcus Library—plus resources available through interlibrary loan—will allow you to dig deep into what you’re studying. If you’re not sure where to begin, we can point you in the right direction.
